title: No Rp/Ip in PBE
body: so i have had my pbe account for a while but havent really played on it. a month ago i started it up and made the actual account info but since then i still have not got the inital rp and ip i was leveled to 30 but nothing else and ip i have on my account i got from games played. is there a way to activate or acquire the rp/ip? pbe account name is **ST6 Hades**

replies.body: I have the same problem on my PBE account my name on PBE is "Azka01"
You may need to go into the store and act like you're buying something, but stop at the last confirmation step. By starting a purchase, your currency values should refresh to show the actual values.
it wont even allow me to click the buy option because i have 0 rp. i have done numerous things from forums but i still have nothing.
